txt.en: In addition to the Longbeards, the Zhélruka Dwarves of the East have an ancestral claim to Gundabad and the surrounding lands. King Durin II offered succour to the Zhélruka Dwarves, who had lost their home to the same destruction that had caused the Berg-breaking, at Gundabad. Now, a number of Zhélruka have made common cause with Durin to aid in the reclaiming of Gundabad and to make Gundabad their new home.
